alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 10:31AM CST until March 03 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CST FOR PICKENS COUNTY... At 1030 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kennedy to near Memphis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Pickensville, McMullen, Garden, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Gainesville Lake Campground, Dillburg, North Pickens Airport, McShan, Shaw, George Downer Airport, Owens, Kirk, Pioneer, Cochrane and Lubbub. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
